md:
giải nghĩa từ "effort" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

**Effort**

* **Noun**: (nỗ lực) - an attempt to do something or to achieve something
	+ Example: "She made a great effort to finish the project on time."
	+ Related words: try, attempt, endeavor, struggle
	+ Antonyms: laziness, idleness, inactivity

* **Verb**: (nỗ lực) - to make an attempt to do something or to achieve something
	+ Example: "We will effort to improve our customer service."
	+ Related words: strive, endeavor, try, struggle
	+ Antonyms: give up, surrender, abandon

Note: The verb form of "effort" is not commonly used in modern English, and it's more common to use the verb "to make an effort" instead.

In Vietnamese, "effort" can be translated to "nỗ lực" or "sự cố gắng".
html:
giải nghĩa từ "effort" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

Effort

  • Noun: (nỗ lực) - an attempt to do something or to achieve something

    • Example: "She made a great effort to finish the project on time."
    • Related words: try, attempt, endeavor, struggle
    • Antonyms: laziness, idleness, inactivity

  • Verb: (nỗ lực) - to make an attempt to do something or to achieve something

    • Example: "We will effort to improve our customer service."
    • Related words: strive, endeavor, try, struggle
    • Antonyms: give up, surrender, abandon

Note: The verb form of "effort" is not commonly used in modern English, and it's more common to use the verb "to make an effort" instead.

In Vietnamese, "effort" can be translated to "nỗ lực" or "sự cố gắng".
